casebody.data:
WINDHAM
v.
BRITTHAVEN. No. 641P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Michael C. Hurly, Raleigh, Erin D. McNeill, T. Carlton Younger, III, for Britthaven, Inc., et al. Thomas W. Henson, Jr., Rocky Mount, for Deborah Windham.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of December 2005 by Plaintiff to Vacate Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
